meta.title: Home - American Leadership Academy | Tuition-Free PK-12 Arizona Charter Schools

meta.name: description
meta.content: Home - ALA is a network of tuition-free Arizona charter schools. We provide the best educational experience possible all in a moral and wholesome environment.
Home - ALA is a network of tuition-free Arizona charter schools. We provide the best educational experience possible all in a moral and wholesome environment.
Home - American Leadership Academy | Tuition-Free PK-12 Arizona Charter Schools

meta.name: format-detection

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home home-main fsHasTheme70

header.h2: ALA - American Leadership Academy - homepage logo

img.alt: ALA - American Leadership Academy - Homepage Logo

section.class: fsElement fsResourceElement fsSlideshow universal-slideshow fsSlideshowHorizontal fsStatePlaying

div.p: Welcome to American Leadership Academy, where we combine academic excellence and character development to create an exceptional educational experience.

div.class: fsElement fsResourceElement fsSingleItem hp custom-image orange

div.p: We don’t just teach our students to be smart—we R.A.I.S.E them to be leaders. Learn about American Leadership Academy's R.A.I.S.E and leadership values and how we instill these core concepts into our student's day-to-day lives.
R.A.I.S.E - A values based curriculum

div.class: fsElement fsResourceElement fsSingleItem hp custom-image teal

div.p: We prepare our students for both college and career, knowing that experience and skills expand beyond the classroom. Learn about our nurturing curriculum, financial literacy classes, advanced placement courses, and more.
College and career prep

div.class: fsElement fsResourceElement fsSingleItem hp custom-image purple

div.p: We know that students will have the best educational experience possible when exposed to activities and extracurriculars that develop leadership, teamwork, and other skills. Explore what classes, clubs, camps, and activities American Leadership Academy has to offer.
Extracurricular activities

div.class: fsElement fsResourceElement fsSingleItem hp custom-image red

div.p: The latest information, updates and FAQs shared with our families and staff can be found here:
COVID-19 Information & Updates

div.class: fsElement fsPostElement fsSlideshow posts-slider fsThumbnailLarge fsItemCount_5 fsSlideshowHorizontal

div.p: During these times, kindness is something that is needed more than ever. View this fantastic video on kindness from one of our amazing students here at ALA!

article.a: Read More about Spreading Kindness at ALA

img.alt: Free Grab & Go lunches at select ALA sites & surrounding areas

div.a: Free Grab & Go lunches at select ALA sites & surrounding areas

article.a: Read More about Free Grab & Go lunches at select ALA sites & surrounding areas

img.alt: National Signing Day at American Leadership Academy Schools

div.a: National Signing Day at American Leadership Academy Schools

div.p: We are proud of our ALA students! 8 of our athletes signed their letter of intent to play college athletics on National Signing Day (February 5th).

article.a: Read More about National Signing Day at American Leadership Academy Schools

img.alt: You Inspire Us, Ms. Cleveland! 12 News' A+ Teacher of the Week

div.a: You Inspire Us, Ms. Cleveland! 12 News' A+ Teacher of the Week

div.p: You inspire us, Ms. Cleveland! Watch the 12 News segment where 4th-grade teacher Crystal Cleveland is recognized for her dedication to education.

article.a: Read More about You Inspire Us, Ms. Cleveland! 12 News' A+ Teacher of the Week

img.alt: Plan for the Future: 2020 College & Career Fair

div.a: Plan for the Future: 2020 College & Career Fair

div.p: Save the date! American Leadership Academy is hosting a district-wide College & Career Fair for our 10th-12th graders. Meet & greet with over 25+ colleges, hiring organizations, and more.

article.a: Read More about Plan for the Future: 2020 College & Career Fair

div.class: fsElement fsCalendar fsSlideshow events-slider fsItemCount_20 fsSlideshowHorizontal

div.div: American Leadership Academy - District Office, 2250 E Germann Rd #14, Chandler, AZ 85286
American Leadership Academy - District Office, 2250 E Germann Rd #14, Chandler, AZ 85286
American Leadership Academy - District Office, 2250 E Germann Rd #14, Chandler, AZ 85286

div.p: Schedule a tour or stop by and visit one of our Arizona charter schools, today! We offer outstanding educational experiences for PK-12 students in Gilbert, Mesa, Queen Creek, Florence, and San Tan Valley. When you visit our campus, you’ll see first hand why so many families choose American Leadership Academy.

"This school was the best decision we have made. Not only is the school amazing but the teachers are absolutely wonderful. With the class sizing being small they can really focus on each child’s needs."
- JAMIE SANDERS. Gilbert South K-6 Parent, Google Review.

"I love this school. The staff and teachers are amazing. I'm amazed with what my children learned in kindergarten and I have children in the upper grades and well. Just overall pleasant experiences. I would highly recommend them to anyone. I'm hoping to see 7 to 12 coming here in future years. "
- LIZ WRISTON. Anthem South K-6 Parent, Google Review.
"My kids have really excelled at this school! Great faculty and atmosphere! I love the small town feel of the high school - love the sports programs and the coaches as well!"
- TRAVIS TENNEY. Gilbert North 7-12 Parent, Facebook Review.

At American Leadership Academy, we don't just teach our students to be smart—we R.A.I.S.E them to be leaders. Learn more about why so many families choose ALA by scheduling a tour. We're dedicated to giving students the best educational experience possible!
Teachers at American Leadership Academy receive...

ul.li: A current average teacher salary of $44,961 (versus prior salary of $42,537).
An average increase of 5.7% or $2,424 from FY19-FY20.
A bonus of $4,000 available for performance (Prop 301).
Health benefit options with $0 employee premium.
Ability to teach and contribute to a moral & wholesome environment.

div.p: At ALA, we combine academic excellence and character development to create an exceptional educational experience. Our students are prepared to not just be the great students of today, but the great leaders of tomorrow.

img.alt: ALA- American Leadership Academy - Footer Logo Blue

div.p: FED Note: Please check Source tab from top menu if you want to ever change the phone number and make sure you keep the custom class phone. e.g.

6913 E. Rembrandt Ave., Suite #2
Mesa, AZ 85212

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

div.p: Due to concerns about COVID-19, and due to the state-mandated closure ALA schools will be closed through the end of the 2019-2020 school year.
Please click here for our latest notifications, updates, information and FAQs regarding COVID-19.
